title: Powering the Future of Skill Education
author: Nihal S

content.value: In today's dynamic education landscape, Ulipsu stands out as a pioneer ‚Äî a one-of-a-kind platform offering multi-skill learning for school students across India. But behind the scenes of this growing EdTech success story lies a powerful engine driving its reach and engagement ‚Äî Leadz.site, Ulipsu's performance marketing partner.
Together, this synergy is reshaping how schools discover and adopt 21st-century skill education.
Ulipsu: A Game-Changer in Skill Education

Ulipsu is more than just an EdTech platform. It's a composite skill lab that enables students to explore over 400+ curated modules across 10+ essential skills ‚Äî from coding and storytelling to entrepreneurship and AI.
Leadz.site: Fueling Smart, Scalable Growth

As Ulipsu's performance marketing partner, Leadz.site played a pivotal role in driving growth by targeting and acquiring high-intent leads specifically from A and A+ category schools. Their expertise in optimizing ad campaigns across multiple platforms helped reduce the cost per lead while significantly improving ROI. By delivering actionable, data-driven insights, they elevated the overall quality of leads and enhanced conversion rates. Through these strategically crafted campaigns, Leadz.site ensured that Ulipsu reached the right audiences, allowing school decision-makers to clearly recognize the value of the Ulipsu platform.
Results That Speak

Thanks to Leadz.site's focused performance marketing:

  • Ulipsu saw month-on-month improvement in cost-per-lead.
  • Engagement from school leaders increased, with more meaningful demos and closures.
  • Ulipsu expanded its reach to new regions, strengthening its footprint across India.
The Perfect Partnership

What made this partnership work? A shared vision. Ulipsu wanted to transform education, and Leadz.site knew how to get that message across effectively.

This isn't just a client-agency success story ‚Äî it's a blueprint for how EdTech and performance marketing can come together to create long-term, scalable impact in education.
What's Next?

With continued support from Leadz.site, Ulipsu is now aiming to scale globally, starting with CBSE schools in G7 countries. The future is bright ‚Äî and skill-first.

Are you an EdTech startup or education brand looking to scale smart?
üëâ Partner with Leadz.site ‚Äî your growth, optimized.

title: Aroma Streett Cafe - Branding & Product Photoghaphy
author: Nihal

content.value: Aroma Streett Cafe, located near MSRIT College, has become a popular spot for students and locals alike. Our team played a crucial role in enhancing their brand presence and performance marketing strategies.

We focused on boosting their home delivery services through Swiggy and Zomato, ensuring that their delicious offerings reached a wider audience. Additionally, we conducted professional product photography to highlight their menu items, making them irresistible to potential customers.
Our Approach

Our approach was centered around creating a cohesive brand identity and leveraging digital marketing channels to drive growth. By targeting the right audience and optimizing their online presence, we helped Aroma Streett Cafe achieve significant milestones in their business journey.

title: Helping Communn Build Meaningful Connections ‚Äî How Leadz.site Elevated Their Digital Presence
author: Nihal S

content.value: At Leadz.site, we believe in building more than just campaigns ‚Äî we build long-term partnerships that grow alongside our clients' goals. One of our most impactful collaborations has been with Communn, a unique community-building platform that bridges the gap between businesses and their local audience, with a special focus on creating real-world experiences through tech.

Communn's mission was clear ‚Äî to help restaurants, studios, and local businesses build communities of loyal customers using events, content, and digital interaction. They weren't just selling a product; they were enabling a lifestyle.
Marketing Highlights for Communn

We started by identifying what made Communn stand out in a crowded market. After a series of discovery sessions, we built a unique brand narrative: Communities over clicks. This laid the foundation for all marketing efforts going forward ‚Äî from ad copy to visuals and CTAs.
Brand Positioning & Strategy

We started by identifying what made Communn stand out in a crowded market. After a series of discovery sessions, we built a unique brand narrative: Communities over clicks.This laid the foundation for all marketing efforts going forward ‚Äî from ad copy to visuals and CTAs.
Performance Marketing Campaigns

Our ad team rolled out targeted Meta campaigns that focused on creating curiosity and capturing leads ‚Äî just like Communn wanted. We implemented a mix of: Instagram story ads to boost awareness, Lead magnet forms to collect emails and phone numbers, Local business-centric messaging tailored to yoga studios, caf√©s, and coworking spaces
Landing Page Optimization

To improve conversions, we created custom landing pages that mirrored the ad messaging and gave users a seamless journey from click to sign-up. These were A/B tested for:

  • i. CTA clarity
  • ii. Scroll behavior
  • iii. Mobile responsiveness
Video Scripts & Content Production

Communn's brand thrives on storytelling. We helped script and produce short-form videos and WhatsApp broadcast flows that drove engagement, encouraged subscriptions, and highlighted successful community case studies.
Results at a Glance

• üìà 70% increase in lead volume within 2 months
  • üêû 30% reduction in cost per lead
  • üß† 100% alignment of brand messaging across platforms
  • üöÄ Launched 3 community programs in under 90 days

title: Scaling Internzvalley from Vision to Venture ‚Äî How Leadz.site Helped Build, Grow, and Thrive
author: Nihal S

content.value: At Leadz.site, we're not just marketers ‚Äî we're partners in growth. One of the most inspiring journeys we've had the privilege to be a part of is Internzvalley ‚Äî a startup that began as a one-man vision and grew into a 150-member powerhouse connecting students to meaningful internship opportunities.
üöÄ From 1 to 150: A Journey of Exponential Growth

When Internzvalley first approached us, they were just getting started ‚Äî one person, one mission, and a big idea. In under two years, with the right blend of strategy, execution, and support, they scaled into a 150-member team with real traction across campuses and startup ecosystems.
1. Built Not One, But Two Full-Scale Websites

We designed, developed, and launched two major websites over the course of two years ‚Äî one for students, and one for startups. Each was built to:

  • Clearly communicate Internzvalley's unique value
  • Handle large-scale onboarding and applications
  • Be responsive, fast, and conversion-optimized

The updated U/I helped increase sign-ups and gave the brand a professional digital face that scaled with their growth.
2. Business Strategy & Consultation

Internzvalley wasn't just looking for leads ‚Äî they were building a new category in the market. We worked closely with their founding team to provide:

  • Go-to-market strategy
  • Revenue model refinement
  • B2B and B2C marketing playbooks
  • Operational workflows and automation

Our insights helped them attract not just users, but investors, partners, and collaborators who believed in their vision.
3. Performance Marketing & Growth

Once the foundations were set, we turned on the fuel. Our team led Internzvalley's marketing across platforms:

  • Meta Ads for student acquisition
  • Google Ads for startup onboarding
  • Organic campaigns on Instagram and LinkedIn
  • Referral-based engagement funnels for campuses

We didn't just aim for vanity metrics ‚Äî we delivered real growth in terms of verified leads, completed internships, and brand awareness.
4. Community Building & Brand Identity

We helped shape Internzvalley's brand personality to resonate with Gen Z and startup founders alike ‚Äî fun, ambitious, trustworthy, and modern. From their tagline to color palette, from email flows to WhatsApp scripts, every detail was crafted to build trust and relatability.
üìù The Results?

• 2 full-scale websites launched
  • Scaled from 1 to 150 team members
  • 3000+ student sign-ups within 90 days
